translations.translation: But to serve Me; (that) this is the straight path?
and serve Me alone: this is the Straight Way?
Did We not command you to worship Me and tell you that this is the straight path?"
“And that you shall worship Me? This is the Straight Path.”
And that you should worship Me. That is the straight path."
And that you should serve Me; this is the right way.
and that you should serve Me? This is a straight path.
But that ye worship Me? That was the right path.
but to worship Me? Surely, that is a straight path.
And that: ye shall worship Me; this is the straight path?
Worship Me. That is a straight path”?
And that ye should worship Me, (for that) this was the Straight Way?
And that you should worship Me [Alone Islamic Monotheism, and set up not rivals, associate-gods with Me]. That is a Straight Path.
and that you worship Me? Surely, that is the Straight Path.
And that you shall serve Me? This is a straight path.
And that you worship [only] Me? This is a straight path.
[36:61] and that [you should] worship Me, [and that you should] affirm My Oneness and obey Me — that is the straight path?
(But that ye worship Me) but that you should believe in My divine Oneness? (That) the profession of Allah's divine Oneness (was the right path) a straight, true religion.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: { وَأَنِ ٱعْبُدُونِي } ووحدوني، واعتقدوا كمال أسمائي وأوصافي واستقلالي في عموم تدبيراتي وتصرفاتي في ملكي وملكوتي، وامتثلوا أمري ولا تشركوا معي في الوجود شيئاً من مظاهري ومصنوعاتي { هَـٰذَا } المعهود الموثوق { صِرَاطٌ مُّسْتَقِيمٌ } [يس: 61] موصل إلى توحيدي، فاتخذوه سبيلاً، ولا تركنوا إلى الذين ضلوا عن طريقي وظلموا أنفسهم بالخروج عن مقتضى حدودي وأوامري وأحكامي وحكمي وتذكيراتي
